attributes.action: Create a Cyber Magna Carta for UK citizens
attributes.additional_details: We want parliament to bring in a bill which stops GCHQ from mass surveillance (looking at our messages, through our camera, microphones, ect). Target survellience is to be kept. Make it illegal for businesses/companies to take our data and sell it to other intrested parties. The govenment &businesses have given themselves unlimited power to see our private information without real discussion with the public so we need this to stop and create a bill (cyber magna carta) to bring a stop to this.
attributes.background: The government (through GCHQ) have given themselves unlimited access to our phones, computers, tablets and other electronic computing devices. We haven't given them permission for them to do this. Businesses and Corportation also have access to our personal data and exchange this for money.
